llama2-70b_direct_sole-planning_results:
Day 1 (March 14th): Sun Valley to San Diego

* Drive from Sun Valley to San Diego (duration: 14 hours 9 mins, distance: 1,461 km, cost: $73)
* Check-in at a beachfront hotel in San Diego that allows parties and has a minimum stay of 2 nights
* Spend the afternoon exploring Balboa Park and visiting the San Diego Zoo
* In the evening, enjoy Mediterranean cuisine at Aladdin's restaurant

Day 2 (March 15th): San Diego

* Take a day trip to La Jolla and spend the morning visiting the Torrey Pines State Natural Reserve
* Have lunch at one of the seafood restaurants in La Jolla Cove
* In the afternoon, visit the Museum of Contemporary Art San Diego in downtown San Diego
* For dinner, head to Little Italy and try some Italian cuisine at Buon Appetito

Day 3 (March 16th): San Diego to Oakland

* Drive from San Diego to Oakland (duration: 7 hours 38 mins, distance: 789 km, cost: $39)
* Check-in at a hotel in downtown Oakland that allows parties and has a minimum stay of 2 nights
* Spend the afternoon exploring Jack London Square and taking a stroll along the waterfront
* In the evening, enjoy Indian cuisine at Taste of India restaurant

Day 4 (March 17th): Oakland

* Take a day trip to Napa Valley and visit some of the wineries
* Have lunch at one of the winery restaurants
* In the afternoon, return to Oakland and spend some time exploring Lake Merritt
* For dinner, head to Chinatown and try some Chinese cuisine at Flavors of China restaurant

Day 5 (March 18th): Departure from Oakland

* Spend the morning shopping for souvenirs or visiting any last-minute attractions in Oakland
* Depart for Sun Valley (duration: 11 hours 36 mins, distance: 1,204 km, cost: $60)

Budget Breakdown:

* Accommodation (5 nights): $1,700
* Transportation (driving from Sun Valley to San Diego, Oakland, and Napa Valley; and fuel for the duration of the trip): $295
* Food and dining (4 lunches, 4 dinners): $830
* Activities and entrance fees (Balboa Park, San Diego Zoo, Torrey Pines State Natural Reserve, Museum of Contemporary Art San Diego, Jack London Square, Lake Merritt, Napa Valley wineries): $675
* Miscellaneous (souvenirs, unexpected expenses): $200
Total: $11,400

This itinerary should fit your preferences and stay within your budget. It allows for a variety of culinary experiences and visits to several attractions in San Diego and Oakland, while also allowing for some time for relaxation and exploration.
